item.title: PowerBI / Tableau Expert - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a highly skilled Power BI / Tableau and Data Visualization Specialist to support our data analytics and reporting efforts.

The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing, managing, and optimizing Power BI dashboards and reports, ensuring they are both visually appealing and insightful.

You will work closely with our project team and customers to understand their data needs and translate them into meaningful visualizations that inform business decisions.

Key Responsibilities:

+ Develop and maintain Power BI dashboards and reports to provide actionable insights for various departments.

+ Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand their data visualization needs and translate requirements into effective visual solutions.

+ Ensure data accuracy and integrity by performing data validation and troubleshooting any discrepancies.

+ Optimize existing dashboards and reports for performance and usability.

+ Create documentation and provide training to end-users on Power BI tools and best practices.

+ Stay updated with the latest trends and best practices in data visualization and Power BI.

+ Assist in the design and development of data models and schemas to support reporting needs.

Hourly Range: $32.00-$60.00
Posted On: June 03, 2024 09:45 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:API Integration, Dashboard, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Tableau, Data Analysis, Business Intelligence, Data Modeling, SQL, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization
Skills: API Integration, Dashboard, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Tableau, Data Analysis, Business Intelligence, Data Modeling, SQL, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: MS Dynamics CRM Senior Technical Consultant - Real estate domain - Upwork
item.description:
We are hiring 6 Technical consultants in MS Dynamics CRM, FnO and cloud migration good implementation experience in Real estate domain. This is an offshore position for our client based in UAE, however, may require that the resource be present onsite on need basis. The contract period shall be 6 months full time commitment, and may be extended to 12 months.

YOU MUST HAVE REAL ESTATE DOMAIN EXPERIENCE WITH MS DYNAMICS FnO, CRM  & CLOUD MIGRAITIONS.

The requirement of the MS CRM (Technical ) Consultant is to provide support to the MS Dynamics CRM cloud migration process as well as re-engineering initiative, effectively handle any additional needs as they arise, all while prioritizing cost-effectiveness and maintaining high quality standards in order to ensure that the Microsoft Dynamics systems are operating at their full potential and aligned with evolving business needs

Job Requirements
The technical & functional consultant should have hands-on expertise specifically in MS dynamics Finance & Operations applications and their integration, along with a proven track record in Real Estate and Property Management, as well as MS Dynamics CRM cloud migration.
• CRM custom modules - Design, develop, and implement custom modules tailored to specific business needs
• CRM development and customization - Develop new functionalities and enhance existing features within the CRM platform.

• Power Platform - Utilize Microsoft Power Platform (Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI) to build custom business solutions to improve operational efficiency.

• Custom plugins and workflows - Create and modify custom plugins and workflows to extend CRM capabilities.

• CRM integration - Integrate CRM systems with various third-party applications to enhance data flow and functionality.

• Cloud Migration - Plan and execute the migration of CRM systems to cloud. Ensure data security, integrity, and compliance during the migration process..

INTERESTED CANDIDATES PLEASE SHARE YOUR RATE CARDS FOR OFFSHORE AND ONSITE CHARGES AND ALSO MENTION THE AVAILABILITY. YOU CAN SHARE THE PROFILES IN talent at resource-log dot com

Budget: $4,000

item.title: Azure Cloud Expert for Shri Lakshmi Steel Suppliers - Upwork
item.description:
Scope of Work: Azure Cloud Server Management
1. Initial Assessment and Planning:
Conduct a thorough assessment of the existing Azure cloud infrastructure.
Analyze the performance, security, and scalability of the current setup.
Collaborate with the IT team to understand business requirements and future growth plans.
Develop a comprehensive plan for optimizing and expanding the Azure environment.
2. Server Monitoring and Management:
Implement robust monitoring solutions to track the health and performance of all Azure servers.
Monitor resource utilization, network traffic, and system logs to ensure optimal performance.
Proactively identify and address any potential issues or bottlenecks.
Perform regular maintenance tasks such as software updates, security patches, and backups.
Provide 24/7 monitoring and support to ensure maximum uptime and reliability.
3. Server Deployment and Configuration:
Assist in the deployment of new servers and services as per business requirements.
Configure virtual machines (VMs), network settings, and storage solutions.
Optimize server configurations for performance, security, and cost-efficiency.
Document the deployment process and provide training to the IT team as needed.
4. Tally Cloud Server Management:
Ensure smooth operation of the Tally Cloud server serving 130 users for daily ERP operations.
Monitor Tally server performance and troubleshoot any issues that may arise.
Scale the server resources as needed to accommodate increasing user demands.
Implement best practices for data security, access control, and backup management.
5. Datalake Server Migration and Management:
Assist in migrating the Datalake Server with Power BI services to Python Dashboard.
Deploy and configure the new server environment for Python Dashboard.
Migrate existing data and reports from Power BI to the new platform.
Provide training and support to users for accessing and utilizing the new reporting system.
6. SAP B1 and Integrated Portal VM Management:
Manage the deployment and configuration of additional VMs for SAP B1 and Integrated Portal.
Optimize server resources and network connectivity for optimal performance.
Ensure seamless integration between SAP B1, Integrated Portal, and other systems.
Implement load balancing and failover mechanisms for high availability.
7. Network Configuration and Load Balancing:
Configure VPN networks for secure communication between on-premises and cloud environments.
Implement load balancing solutions to distribute traffic evenly across servers.
Optimize network performance and scalability for future growth.
Monitor network traffic and security logs for any suspicious activity.
8. Scalability and Future Planning:
Design and implement scalable architectures to accommodate future growth and expansion.
Evaluate new Azure services and technologies for potential adoption.
Provide recommendations for optimizing cost and performance based on usage patterns.
Continuously monitor industry trends and best practices for cloud infrastructure management.
9. Priority Support and Timely Response:
Provide high-priority support and timely response to any critical issues or emergencies.
Maintain open communication channels for reporting and resolving issues.
Ensure that service level agreements (SLAs) are met and exceeded consistently.
10. Documentation and Knowledge Transfer:
Document all configurations, processes, and procedures related to Azure server management.
Provide comprehensive training and knowledge transfer to the IT team.
Empower the internal team to handle routine maintenance tasks and minor troubleshooting independently.
11. Ongoing Collaboration and Review:
Schedule regular meetings and checkpoints to review the performance and effectiveness of the Azure environment.
Solicit feedback from stakeholders and users to identify areas for improvement.
Collaborate with the IT team to implement any necessary changes or optimizations.
12. Compliance and Security:
Ensure compliance with relevant industry regulations and data protection standards.
Implement robust security measures to protect against cyber threats and data breaches.
Conduct regular security audits and vulnerability assessments.
Stay up-to-date with the latest security patches and updates from Azure.
13. Reporting and Analytics:
Provide regular reports and analytics on server performance, uptime, and utilization.
Identify trends and patterns to optimize resource allocation and cost management.
Customize reports based on the specific requirements of stakeholders and management.
14. Disaster Recovery and Business Continuity:
Develop and maintain disaster recovery plans and procedures for Azure servers.
Implement backup and replication strategies to minimize data loss and downtime.
Conduct regular disaster recovery drills and tests to validate the effectiveness of the plans.
15. Additional Services (Optional):
Provide expertise and assistance in other areas such as database management, application development, or DevOps.
Offer consulting services for optimizing cloud costs, performance tuning, or architecture design.


Hourly Range: $20.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 03, 2024 07:17 UTC
Category: Cloud Engineering
Skills:Cloud Architecture, Cloud Engineering Consultation, Cloud Engineering, Cloud Management, Cloud Implementation, Cloud Computing, Microsoft Azure, Network Administration, System Administration, DevOps
Skills: Cloud Architecture, Cloud Engineering Consultation, Cloud Engineering, Cloud Management, Cloud Implementation, Cloud Computing, Microsoft Azure, Network Administration, System Administration, DevOps
Country: India

item.title: Part-Time Business Analyst / Business Improvements in IT Company - Upwork
item.description:
Upwork Rate: $3/hr
Title: Part-Time Business Analyst / Business Improvements in IT Company $3/h

Description:  

We are seeking an experienced Part-Time Business Analyst / Business Improvements in IT Company to join our team. This is a hybrid role between Business Analyst (Requirement gathering) and Business Improvements person (Analysis / Proposal / Actual implementation).

Improvements are related to an IT Company and most related to process improvements, automation, simplification etc.

I need someone who is proactive, has great communication skills and can hit the ground running, most importantly has great active listening skills and understanding and following high level guidance and feedback they receive.

DO NOT APPLY:
If you want more than $3/h, offers above $3/h will be automatically rejected.
If you want higher rate after you start, asking for more after you start will automatically end your contract.
Applying with Upwork "Rise" will result in automatic rejection of your offer.

If you don’t have up to 10h a week free on a regular basis. (If you are overloaded with work / commute / commitments, DO NOT APPLY).

This is a long term engagement, after a trial.

Key info about the job:

This is a PART-TIME Freelance work.  

Irregular hours, from 0h to 10h a week, sometimes more but only if you have availability.  

You MUST use time-tracking system we have + Upwork time tracking.

You MUST estimate effort for each task.

You MUST communicate progress, blockers, issues, availability etc.

Typically, Hours of work will be agreed based on the project and your availability, and there will be flexibility in this.

This freelancer work is 3 months work with likely extension if you perform well, and 0 days’ notice on both sides.


Responsibilities:
Identify & understand a business problem.
Propose solutions.
Break down solution into projects, deliverables and phases.
Estimate effort / cost of the improvement.
Organise tasks for developers/team to implement.
Manage project from Product Owner perspective.





Hourly Range: $3.00
Posted On: June 03, 2024 06:07 UTC
Category: Digital Project Management
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, IT Project Management, Project Analysis
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, IT Project Management, Project Analysis
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: MS Power Apps Architect and Product Manager with Power Pages, Automate, etc - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled MS Dynamics Architect/Developer with expertise in utilizing the full Power Platform suite of tools to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will possess a strong background in developing, customizing, and implementing Microsoft Dynamics 365 solutions, ensuring seamless integration with Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, and other components of the Power Platform. In addition to your technical responsibilities, you will also manage the development process, including product management and direct client interaction. You will design and deliver scalable and efficient solutions that meet our business needs, leveraging your deep understanding of Dynamics 365 architecture, data models, and best practices. Additionally, you will collaborate closely with stakeholders to gather requirements, provide technical guidance, and deliver high-quality solutions that drive business growth and operational efficiency.

In this role, you will also be tasked with maintaining and optimizing existing Dynamics 365/Power Apps applications, troubleshooting issues, and implementing enhancements to improve system performance and user experience. Your ability to develop custom applications using Power Apps, automate workflows with Power Automate, and create insightful reports and dashboards with Power BI will be crucial to our success. Furthermore, you will be responsible for managing the end-to-end development lifecycle, coordinating with product management to ensure alignment with business objectives, and engaging directly with clients to understand their needs and deliver tailored solutions. The successful candidate will be a proactive problem solver with excellent communication skills, capable of working independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced, agile environment. A commitment to continuous learning and staying updated with the latest advancements in the Power Platform, Power Pages, Power Automate, Power BI, Dataverse, etc is essential for this position.

Skills required:

- MS Power Pages
- Power BI
- Power Apps
- Dataverse
- MS Dynamics
- Integration with connectors, APIs, IAM systems
- Front end coding (react, angular, etc) to augment as needed


Hourly Range: $30.00-$60.00

item.title: Build an impressive dashboard from excel data - Upwork
item.description:
Project Title: Create Interactive Cybersecurity & IT Dashboard and Reports in Excel

Project Description:

We're seeking a skilled Excel expert to design and develop an interactive dashboard and accompanying reports to visualize key cybersecurity and IT metrics for board-level presentations. This dashboard will be a core component of our new service, The Board of Protectors (BoP), which provides AI-driven insights to boards of directors.

Key Deliverables:

Interactive Dashboard:

Design a visually appealing and user-friendly dashboard in Excel.
Incorporate the following KPIs (or similar, subject to discussion):
Cyber Risk Exposure (CRE)
Cyber Resilience Time (CRT)
Cybersecurity Credit Rating (CCR)
Data Breach Cost Exposure (DBCE)
Cyber Incident Insurance Deductible
Annualized Loss Expectancy (ALE)
Cybersecurity Return on Investment (CS-ROI)
IT Operational Cost per Employee
IT Asset Utilization
IT Innovation Index
IT Agility Index
Include interactive elements such as filters, drill-downs, and slicers to enable deeper analysis.
Utilize charts, graphs, and tables to effectively visualize the data.
Accompanying Reports:

Create concise and informative reports in Excel that summarize key findings from the dashboard.
Include actionable recommendations based on the data analysis.
Tailor reports for board-level consumption, focusing on financial impact and strategic implications.
Skills and Experience:

Strong proficiency in Excel, including advanced formulas, pivot tables, charts, and macros.
Experience in designing and developing interactive dashboards.
Knowledge of cybersecurity and IT metrics is a plus.
Ability to translate complex data into clear and concise insights.
Excellent communication and presentation skills.
Additional Information:

We will provide sample data for testing and development.
We are open to suggestions for additional KPIs or visualizations.
The ideal candidate will be able to deliver high-quality work on time and within budget.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 02, 2024 16:34 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Excel, Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Tableau, Microsoft Power BI
Skills: Microsoft Excel, Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Tableau, Microsoft Power BI
Country: Jordan

item.title: Dashboard to visualize Drought - Upwork
item.description:
Job: Local hosted web development of Drought alarm system based on SPEI prediction  
Available data:  
1. Monthly Timestamped data of SPEI(1,3,6,9,12 months) of District with Longitude and latitude data of 1960
to 2023 years
2. Monthly Timestamped data of Predicted SPEI(1,3,6,9,12 months) of District with Longitude and latitude
data of 2024 to 2036 years
Basics definitions:  
1. SPEI: Standardised Precipitation-Evapotranspiration Index This index in calculated based on monthly
precipitation and Temperature mean(average of max and min T). This index show us how far the current
month data is from history's average. This index value ranges from -2 to +2. Where -2 is extreme drought
and +2.

SPEI data are in different time scale SPEI1,SPEI3, SPEI6, SPEI9, SPEI12
Problem statement:  
We need a local hosted web tool which can help us to visualize our GIS history and future data with time selection
and option to download data.  
Example : https://spei.csic.es/map/maps.html#months=1#month=3#year=2024

Methodology:  
Methodology can be selected as per opensource or free visualization tools like PowerBI, Tableau for interactive
map visualization dashboard.  
Work Flow:  
1. We will provide a monthly timestamped data of 193 points of a district with district Shape file. (data will be  
1960 to 2023(actual) and 2024-2036(predicted) of SPEI12.  
2. You have to provide sample visualization mock up design for approval
3. As per approval of mine you have to incorporate comments and prepare final dashboard  
4. We will provide remaining data of SPEI1,SPEI3,SPEI6,SPEI9
5. You will integrate all data and demonstrate method data upload/download. You will have to explain local
hosting method.

Budget: $10

item.title: Power BI Expert Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are a communications and marketing consultancy firm comprised of approximately 50 employees seeking a talented Power BI expert to assist us in setting up our systems to be able to utilize date accumulated in our Jira software. As we’re looking to leverage Power BI for data analysis and reporting, we need someone with proven experience in working with Power BI and setting up the system in the following ways:
- Create project P&L report cards
- Integrate timesheets from consultants on Jira relative to contract size
- Create timesheet utilization dashboards across all employees and by projects

Responsibilities:
- Work closely with our team to understand our data needs and objectives.
- Set up the integration between Power BI and our Jira system.
- Develop visually appealing and insightful dashboards and reports based on the accumulated data.
- Provide guidance and support to our team members on effectively using Power BI for data analysis and reporting.

Requirements:
- Proven experience in working with Power BI, including data modeling, visualization, and report development.
- Experience in setting up system integrations, particularly with Jira.
- Experience in working with consultancy firms.
- Strong analytical skills and the ability to translate complex data into actionable insights.
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.

item.title: Part-Time IT Project Manager (Databases/SQL Server/OLTP) $3/h  - Upwork
item.description:
Upwork Rate: $3/hr
Title: Part-Time IT Project Manager / Business Analyst (Databases/SQL Server/OLTP) $3/h

Description:  

We are seeking an experienced IT Project Manager / Business Analyst (Databases/SQL Server/OLTP) to join our team. This is a hybrid role between IT Manager and Business Analyst, and you need to have technical background with databases.

You specialty of IT Manager HAS to be SQL Server Databases with focus on OLTP Solutions.

DO NOT APPLY:
If you want more than $3/h, offers above $3/h will be automatically rejected.
If you want higher rate after you start, asking for more after you start will automatically end your contract.
Applying with Upwork "Rise" will result in automatic rejection of your offer.

If you don’t have up to 10h a week free on a regular basis. (If you are overloaded with work / commute / commitments, DO NOT APPLY).

This is a long term engagement, after a trial.

Key info about the job:

This is a PART-TIME Freelance work.  

Irregular hours, from 0h to 10h a week, sometimes more but only if you have availability.  

You MUST use time-tracking system we have + Upwork time tracking.

You MUST estimate effort for each task.

You MUST communicate progress, blockers, issues, availability etc.

Typically, Hours of work will be agreed based on the project and your availability, and there will be flexibility in this.

This freelancer work is 3 months work with likely extension if you perform well, and 0 days’ notice on both sides.

About the role:

I'm looking for a part-time IT Project Manager with the following responsibilities:

Responsibilities:

Managing SQL Server Developers with OLTP specialty.
Managing DBAs with SQL Server OLTP specialty.
Managing ad-hoc freelancers that helps with specific needs & functionality.
Overseeing quality, efficiency and hitting budgets and timeframes.

In particular we need you to have very good technical understanding of:
SQL Server for OLTP use.
Permissions
Change Data Capture (CDC)
Backups and Recovery.
Version Control (VS)

item.title: Powerbi expert to embed report in web app - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented Power BI Expert to join our team on a remote basis. As a Power BI Expert, you will be responsible for embedding Power BI reports into our web application, which is primarily built using JavaScript. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience working with Power BI and JavaScript to create responsive and visually appealing reports that seamlessly integrate into web applications.

Responsibilities:

- Collaborate with our development team to understand the requirements for embedding Power BI reports into our web application.
- Utilize your expertise in Power BI to create visually appealing and interactive reports that provide meaningful insights to our users.
- Implement responsive design principles to ensure that the embedded reports adapt well to different screen sizes and devices.
- Optimize the performance of embedded reports to ensure fast loading times and smooth user experience.
- Troubleshoot and debug any issues related to embedding Power BI reports in the web application.
- Stay updated on the latest features and best practices in Power BI development to continuously improve the quality of embedded reports.

Requirements:

- Proven experience as a Power BI Developer or similar role, with a strong portfolio showcasing your work.
- Proficiency in Power BI Desktop, including data modeling, DAX calculations, and visualization design.
- Solid understanding of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS for embedding Power BI reports into web applications.
- Experience with Power BI Embedded or similar embedding techniques.
- Familiarity with responsive design principles and techniques.
- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines in a remote work environment.

Preferred Qualifications:

- Experience with Microsoft Azure services, particularly Azure App Service and Azure Active Directory.
- Knowledge of other data visualization tools and libraries, such as D3.js or Highcharts.
- Certification in Power BI or related Microsoft technologies.

If you are passionate about creating compelling data visualizations and have the skills to embed Power BI reports into web applications, we would love to hear from you. Join us in revolutionizing the way our users interact with data!

Hourly Range: $15.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 02, 2024 07:24 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, JavaScript
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, JavaScript
Country: United States
click to apply
